solution.text:
Total number of students = _{j}_ +_{k}_ +_{{(12-j-k)}}_ = 12
Cost per head in bus = Rs.100
\( \Rightarrow \) Therefore, Total cost if all travelled by bus = Number of student x charge per head = 12 x 100= Rs.1200.

content.text: What would be the total cost if all students decided to go by bus?
